verses.text: \w O|strong="H8034"\w* let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* heavens \w be|strong="H8034"\w* broken \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w come|strong="H7264"\w* \w down|strong="H6440"\w*, \w so|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountains \w may|strong="H1471"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* shaking \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* fire puts \w the|strong="H6440"\w* brushwood \w in|strong="H6440"\w* flames, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* water \w is|strong="H6440"\w* boiling \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* heat \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire: \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* name \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w by|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* haters, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* nations \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* shaking \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*;

\w While|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w acts|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* power \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w we|strong="H8085"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w looking|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* come \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* ears \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w past|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* ear \w has|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* \w had|strong="H0853"\w* news \w of|strong="H1870"\w*, \w or|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* eye seen, ... any God \w but|strong="H0859"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*, working \w for|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* man \w who|strong="H3467"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w takes|strong="H5375"\w* pleasure \w in|strong="H1961"\w* doing \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, even \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* keep \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w mind|strong="H7307"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* ways? Truly \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* angry, \w and|strong="H6666"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* doing \w evil|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H6666"\w* sinning \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* past.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w become|strong="H7121"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* unclean \w person|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* good acts \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* dirty robe: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w become|strong="H7121"\w* \w old|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* dead leaf, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* \w sins|strong="H5771"\w*, \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wind, \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w makes|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name, \w or|strong="H0001"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* moved \w to|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w true|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*: \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* face \w is|strong="H3068"\w* veiled \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w given|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* sins.

\w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w O|strong="H4994"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* father; \w we|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* maker; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H5704"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* work \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hand.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* very angry, O Lord, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* do \w not|strong="H1961"\w* keep \w our|strong="H1961"\w* sins \w in|strong="H1961"\w* mind \w for|strong="H3389"\w* ever: \w give|strong="H1961"\w* ear \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* prayer, \w for|strong="H3389"\w* we \w are|strong="H6726"\w* all \w your|strong="H1961"\w* people.

\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* towns \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w waste|strong="H2723"\w*, Zion \w has|strong="H0834"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w waste|strong="H2723"\w*, Jerusalem \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* mass \w of|strong="H1004"\w* broken walls.

\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* holy \w and|strong="H3068"\w* beautiful house, \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers gave praise \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* burned \w with|strong="H3068"\w* fire; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* desire \w have|strong="H3068"\w* come \w to|strong="H5704"\w* destruction.
In view of all this, will you still do nothing, O Lord? will you keep quiet, and go on increasing our punishment?
